br.ufrgs.MASBench.BinaryMaxSum.BMS

Interface Factor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the factor's identity.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFactor, AbstractTwoSidedFactor, AllActiveIncentiveFactor, AtMostOneFactor, CardinalityFactor, ConditionedSelectorFactor, EqualityFactor, ImplicationFactor, IndependentFactor, ProxyFactor, SaturationFactor, SaturationKFactor, SelectorFactor, SingleWeightFactor, StandardFactor, TwoSidedEqualityFactor, TwoSidedReserveFactor, VariableFactor, WeightingFactor

    public interface Factor<T>
    Basic definition of a MaxSum factor.
    Author:
    Marc Pujol (mpujol @ iiia.csic.es)

        Evaluate this factor given the neighbor's values.
        Parameters:
